skipiste.graph

Class Graph

  • java.lang.Object
    • skipiste.graph.Graph

  • public class Graph
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents a graph in the form of an incidence list of Nodes and Edges.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private java.util.Set<Edge> edges
      Set of edges that are held within this graph.
      private java.util.Set<Node> nodes
      Set of nodes that are held within this graph.
      private java.util.Set<Piste> pistes
      Set of Pistes

    • Field Detail

      • nodes

        private java.util.Set<Node> nodes
        Set of nodes that are held within this graph. This data is all already held within the pistes structure. This is here for convenience.

      • edges

        private java.util.Set<Edge> edges
        Set of edges that are held within this graph. This data is all already held within the pistes structure. This is here for convenience.

      • pistes

        private java.util.Set<Piste> pistes
        Set of Pistes
